43 #ifndef EPWM_H
44 #define EPWM_H
45 
46 //*****************************************************************************
47 //
48 // If building with a C++ compiler, make all of the definitions in this header
49 // have a C binding.
50 //
51 //*****************************************************************************
52 #ifdef __cplusplus
53 extern "C"
54 {
55 #endif
56 
57 //*****************************************************************************
58 //
61 //
62 //*****************************************************************************
63 
64 #include <stdbool.h>
65 #include <stdint.h>
66 #include "inc/hw_memmap.h"
67 #include "inc/hw_types.h"
68 #include "inc/hw_epwm.h"
69 #include "cpu.h"
70 #include "debug.h"
71 #include "sysctl.h"
72 
73 //*****************************************************************************
74 //
75 // Address offsets from EPWM_BASE to XCMP, MINDB and DE register memory maps
76 //
77 //*****************************************************************************
78 #define EPWM_O_XCMP 0x0400U
79 #define EPWM_O_DE 0x0800U
80 #define EPWM_O_MINDB 0x0C00U
81 
82 //*****************************************************************************
83 //
84 // Defines for the API.
85 //
86 //*****************************************************************************
87 //*****************************************************************************
88 //
89 // Define to specify mask for source parameter for
90 // EPWM_enableSyncOutPulseSource() & EPWM_disableSyncOutPulseSource()
91 //
92 //*****************************************************************************
93 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_SOURCE_M ((uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_SWEN |\
94  (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_ZEROEN |\
95  (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPBEN |\
96  (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPCEN |\
97  (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPDEN |\
98  (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_DCAEVT1EN |\
99  (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_DCBEVT1EN)
100 
101 //*****************************************************************************
102 //
103 // Values that can be passed to EPWM_enableSyncOutPulseSource() &
104 // EPWM_disableSyncOutPulseSource() as the \e mode parameter.
105 //
106 //*****************************************************************************
108 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_SOFTWARE EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_SWEN
110 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_CNTR_ZERO EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_ZEROEN
112 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_CNTR_COMPARE_B EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPBEN
114 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_CNTR_COMPARE_C EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPCEN
116 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_CNTR_COMPARE_D EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPDEN
118 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_DCA_EVT1_SYNC EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_DCAEVT1EN
120 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_DCB_EVT1_SYNC EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_DCBEVT1EN
122 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_ALL EPWM_SYNC_OUT_SOURCE_M
123 
124 //
125 // Time Base Module
126 //
127 //*****************************************************************************
128 //
131 //
132 //*****************************************************************************
133 typedef enum
134 {
136  EPWM_EMULATION_STOP_AFTER_NEXT_TB = 0,
138  EPWM_EMULATION_STOP_AFTER_FULL_CYCLE = 1,
140  EPWM_EMULATION_FREE_RUN = 2
141 } EPWM_EmulationMode;
142 
143 //*****************************************************************************
144 //
147 //
148 //*****************************************************************************
149 typedef enum
150 {
151  EPWM_COUNT_MODE_DOWN_AFTER_SYNC = 0,
152  EPWM_COUNT_MODE_UP_AFTER_SYNC = 1
153 } EPWM_SyncCountMode;
154 
155 //*****************************************************************************
156 //
159 //
160 //*****************************************************************************
161 typedef enum
162 {
163  EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_1 = 0,
164  EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_2 = 1,
165  EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_4 = 2,
166  EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_8 = 3,
167  EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_16 = 4,
168  EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_32 = 5,
169  EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_64 = 6,
170  EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_128 = 7
171 } EPWM_ClockDivider;
172

174 //
177 //
178 //*****************************************************************************

180 {
181  EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_1 = 0,
182  EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_2 = 1,
183  EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_4 = 2,
184  EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_6 = 3,
185  EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_8 = 4,
186  EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_10 = 5,
187  EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_12 = 6,
188  EPWM_HSCLOCK_DIVIDER_14 = 7
189 } EPWM_HSClockDivider;

192 //*****************************************************************************
193 //
196 //
197 //*****************************************************************************
198 typedef enum
199 {
201  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_DISABLE = 0x0,
203  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM1 = 0x1,
205  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM2 = 0x2,
207  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM3 = 0x3,
209  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM4 = 0x4,
211  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM5 = 0x5,
213  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM6 = 0x6,
215  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM7 = 0x7,
217  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM8 = 0x8,
219  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM9 = 0x9,
221  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM10 = 0xA,
223  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM11 = 0xB,
225  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM12 = 0xC,
227  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM13 = 0xD,
229  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM14 = 0xE,
231  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM15 = 0xF,
233  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM16 = 0x10,
235  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP1 = 0x11,
237  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP2 = 0x12,
239  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP3 = 0x13,
241  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP4 = 0x14,
243  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP5 = 0x15,
245  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP6 = 0x16,
247  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP7 = 0x17,
249  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_INPUTXBAR_OUT5 = 0x18,
251  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_INPUTXBAR_OUT6 = 0x19,
253  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_ETHERCAT_SYNC0 = 0x1A,
255  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_ETHERCAT_SYNC1 = 0x1B,
257  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM17 = 0x1C,
259  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM18 = 0x1D,
261  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_FSIRXA_TRIG1 = 0x1E,
263  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_FSIRXB_TRIG1 = 0x1F,
265  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_FSIRXC_TRIG1 = 0x20,
267  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_FSIRXD_TRIG1 = 0x21,
268 } EPWM_SyncInPulseSource;

373  EPWM_COMP_LOAD_FREEZE = 3,

501 //*****************************************************************************
502 //
505 //
506 //*****************************************************************************
507 typedef enum
508 {
510  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_ZERO = 0x0,
512  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_ZERO = 0x1,
514  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_ZERO = 0x2,
516  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_ZERO = 0x3,
518  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_PERIOD = 0x0,
520  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_PERIOD = 0x4,
522  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_PERIOD = 0x8,
524  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_PERIOD = 0xC,
526  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_UP_CMPA = 0x00,
528  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_UP_CMPA = 0x10,
530  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_UP_CMPA = 0x20,
532  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_UP_CMPA = 0x30,
534  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_DOWN_CMPA = 0x00,
536  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_DOWN_CMPA = 0x40,
538  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_DOWN_CMPA = 0x80,
540  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_DOWN_CMPA = 0xC0,
542  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_UP_CMPB = 0x000,
544  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_UP_CMPB = 0x100,
546  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_UP_CMPB = 0x200,
548  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_UP_CMPB = 0x300,
550  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_DOWN_CMPB = 0x000,
552  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_DOWN_CMPB = 0x400,
554  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_HIGH_DOWN_CMPB = 0x800,
556  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_DOWN_CMPB = 0xC00
557 } EPWM_ActionQualifierEventAction;
558

575  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_UP_T1 = 0x3,
577  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_DOWN_T1 = 0x0,

583  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_DOWN_T1 = 0xC,
585  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_UP_T2 = 0x00,
587  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_LOW_UP_T2 = 0x10,

680 #define EPWM_DB_INPUT_EPWMB 1U
683 #define EPWM_DB_INPUT_DB_RED 2U

753 //
754 // Trip Zone
755 //
756 //*****************************************************************************
757 //
758 // Values that can be passed to EPWM_enableTripZoneSignals() and
759 // EPWM_disableTripZoneSignals() as the tzSignal parameter.
760 //
761 //*****************************************************************************
764 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC1 0x1U
767 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC2 0x2U
770 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC3 0x4U
773 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC4 0x8U
776 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC5 0x10U
779 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC6 0x20U
782 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_DCAEVT2 0x40U
785 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_DCBEVT2 0x80U
788 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT1 0x100U
791 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT2 0x200U
794 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT3 0x400U
797 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT4 0x800U
800 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT5 0x1000U
803 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT6 0x2000U
806 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_DCAEVT1 0x4000U
809 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_DCBEVT1 0x8000U
810 
811 //*****************************************************************************
812 //
815 //
816 //*****************************************************************************
817 typedef enum
818 {
819  EPWM_TZ_DC_OUTPUT_A1 = 0,
820  EPWM_TZ_DC_OUTPUT_A2 = 3,
821  EPWM_TZ_DC_OUTPUT_B1 = 6,
822  EPWM_TZ_DC_OUTPUT_B2 = 9
823 } EPWM_TripZoneDigitalCompareOutput;
824 
825 //*****************************************************************************
826 //
829 //
830 //*****************************************************************************
831 typedef enum
832 {
833  EPWM_TZ_EVENT_DC_DISABLED = 0,
834  EPWM_TZ_EVENT_DCXH_LOW = 1,
835  EPWM_TZ_EVENT_DCXH_HIGH = 2,
836  EPWM_TZ_EVENT_DCXL_LOW = 3,
837  EPWM_TZ_EVENT_DCXL_HIGH = 4,
838  EPWM_TZ_EVENT_DCXL_HIGH_DCXH_LOW = 5
839 } EPWM_TripZoneDigitalCompareOutputEvent;
840 
841 //*****************************************************************************
842 //
845 //
846 //*****************************************************************************
847 typedef enum
848 {
849  EPWM_TZ_ACTION_EVENT_TZA = 0,

1604 #define EPWM_DE_COUNT_UP 0x0U
1606 #define EPWM_DE_COUNT_DOWN 0x1U
1607 
1608 //*****************************************************************************
1609 //
1610 // Values that can be passed to EPWM_enableTripZoneInterrupt()and
1611 // EPWM_disableTripZoneInterrupt() as the tzInterrupt parameter .
1612 //
1613 //*****************************************************************************
1616 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_CBC 0x2U
1619 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_OST 0x4U
1622 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_DCAEVT1 0x8U
1625 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_DCAEVT2 0x10U
1628 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_DCBEVT1 0x20U
1631 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_DCBEVT2 0x40U
1634 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_CAPEVT 0x80U
1635 
1636 //*****************************************************************************
1637 //
1638 // Values that can be returned by EPWM_getTripZoneFlagStatus() .
1639 //
1640 //*****************************************************************************
1643 #define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_CBC 0x2U
1646 #define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_OST 0x4U
1649 #define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_DCAEVT1 0x8U
1652 #define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_DCAEVT2 0x10U
1655 #define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_DCBEVT1 0x20U
1658 #define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_DCBEVT2 0x40U
1661 #define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_CAPEVT 0x80U
1662 
1663 //*****************************************************************************
1664 //
1665 // Value can be passed to EPWM_clearTripZoneFlag() as the
1666 // tzInterrupt parameter and returned by EPWM_getTripZoneFlagStatus().
1667 //
1668 //*****************************************************************************
1671 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT 0x1U
1672 
1673 //*****************************************************************************
1674 //
1675 // Values that can be passed to EPWM_clearCycleByCycleTripZoneFlag()
1676 // as the tzCbcFlag parameter and returned by
1677 // EPWM_getCycleByCycleTripZoneFlagStatus().
1678 //
1679 //*****************************************************************************
1682 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_1 0x1U
1685 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_2 0x2U
1688 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_3 0x4U
1691 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_4 0x8U
1694 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_5 0x10U
1697 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_6 0x20U
1700 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_DCAEVT2 0x40U
1703 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_DCBEVT2 0x80U
1706 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_CAPEVT 0x100U
1707

1709 //

1711 // the tzCbcFlag parameter and returned by the
1712 // EPWM_getOneShotTripZoneFlagStatus() .
1713 //
1714 //*****************************************************************************
1717 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_OST1 0x1U
1720 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_OST2 0x2U
1723 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_OST3 0x4U
1726 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_OST4 0x8U
1729 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_OST5 0x10U
1732 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_OST6 0x20U
1735 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_DCAEVT1 0x40U
1738 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_DCBEVT1 0x80U
1741 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_CAPEVT 0x100U
1742

2428 //*****************************************************************************
2429 //
2430 // Functions APIs shared with HRPWM module
2431 //
2432 //*****************************************************************************
2433 
2434 //
2435 // Period Control related API
2436 //
2437 #define EPWM_setSyncPulseSource HRPWM_setSyncPulseSource
2438 
2439 //*****************************************************************************
2440 //
2441 // Prototypes for the API.
2442 //
2443 //*****************************************************************************
2444 
2445 //*****************************************************************************
2446 //
2456 //
2457 //*****************************************************************************
2458 #ifdef DEBUG
2459 static inline bool EPWM_isBaseValid(uint32_t base)
2460 {
2461  return(
2462  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM1_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2463  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM2_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2464  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM3_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2465  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM4_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2466  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM5_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2467  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM6_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2468  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM7_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2469  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM8_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2470  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM9_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2471  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM10_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2472  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM11_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2473  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM12_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2474  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM13_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2475  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM14_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2476  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM15_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2477  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM16_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2478  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM17_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2479  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM18_BASE_FRAME(0U))
2480  ||
2481 
2482  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM1XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2483  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM2XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2484  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM3XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2485  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM4XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2486  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM5XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2487  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM6XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2488  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM7XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2489  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM8XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2490  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM9XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2491  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM10XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2492  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM11XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2493  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM12XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2494  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM13XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2495  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM14XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2496  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM15XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2497  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM16XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2498  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM17XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2499  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM18XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U))
2500 
2501  );
2502 
2503 }
2504 #endif
2505 
2506 //
2507 // Time Base Sub Module related APIs
2508 //
2509 //*****************************************************************************
2510 //
2519 //
2520 //*****************************************************************************
2521 static inline void
2522 EPWM_setTimeBaseCounter(uint32_t base, uint16_t count)
2523 {
2524  //
2525  // Check the arguments
2526  //
2527  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2528 
2529  //
2530  // Write to TBCTR register
2531  //
2532  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTR) = count;
2533 }
2534 
2535 //*****************************************************************************
2536 //
2549 //
2550 //*****************************************************************************
2551 static inline void
2552 EPWM_setCountModeAfterSync(uint32_t base, EPWM_SyncCountMode mode)
2553 {
2554  //
2555  // Check the arguments
2556  //
2557  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2558 
2559  if(mode == EPWM_COUNT_MODE_UP_AFTER_SYNC)
2560  {
2561  //
2562  // Set PHSDIR bit
2563  //
2564  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) |= EPWM_TBCTL_PHSDIR;
2565  }
2566  else
2567  {
2568  //
2569  // Clear PHSDIR bit
2570  //
2571  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) &= ~EPWM_TBCTL_PHSDIR;
2572  }
2573 }
2574 
2575 //*****************************************************************************
2576 //
2596 //
2597 //*****************************************************************************
2598 static inline void
2599 EPWM_setClockPrescaler(uint32_t base, EPWM_ClockDivider prescaler,
2600  EPWM_HSClockDivider highSpeedPrescaler)
2601 {
2602  //
2603  // Check the arguments
2604  //
2605  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2606 
2607  //
2608  // Write to CLKDIV and HSPCLKDIV bit
2609  //
2610  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) =
2611  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) &
2612  ~(EPWM_TBCTL_CLKDIV_M | EPWM_TBCTL_HSPCLKDIV_M)) |
2613  (((uint16_t)prescaler << EPWM_TBCTL_CLKDIV_S) |
2614  ((uint16_t)highSpeedPrescaler << EPWM_TBCTL_HSPCLKDIV_S)));
2615 } // convert to uint_8?
2616 
2617 //*****************************************************************************
2618 //
2628 //
2629 //*****************************************************************************
2630 static inline void
2631 EPWM_forceSyncPulse(uint32_t base)
2632 {
2633  //
2634  // Check the arguments
2635  //
2636  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2637 
2638  //
2639  // Set SWFSYNC bit
2640  //
2641  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) |= EPWM_TBCTL_SWFSYNC;
2642 }
2643 
2644 //*****************************************************************************
2645 //
2669 //
2670 //*****************************************************************************
2671 static inline void
2672 EPWM_setSyncInPulseSource(uint32_t base, EPWM_SyncInPulseSource source)
2673 {
2674  //
2675  // Check the arguments
2676  //
2677  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2678 
2679  //
2680  // Set EPWM Sync-In Source Mode.
2681  //
2682  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCINSEL) =
2683  (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCINSEL) & (~EPWM_SYNCINSEL_SEL_M)) |
2684  ((uint16_t)source & EPWM_SYNCINSEL_SEL_M);
2685 
2686 }
2687 //*****************************************************************************
2688 //
2720 //
2721 //*****************************************************************************
2722 static inline void
2723 EPWM_enableSyncOutPulseSource(uint32_t base, uint16_t source)
2724 {
2725  //
2726  // Check the arguments
2727  //
2728  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2729  ASSERT(source <= EPWM_SYNC_OUT_SOURCE_M);
2730 
2731  //
2732  // Enable selected EPWM Sync-Out Sources.
2733  //
2734  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCOUTEN) = HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCOUTEN) |
2735  (uint16_t)source;
2736 
2737 }
2738 
2739 //*****************************************************************************
2740 //
2766 //
2767 //*****************************************************************************
2768 static inline void
2769 EPWM_disableSyncOutPulseSource(uint32_t base, uint16_t source)
2770 {
2771  //
2772  // Check the arguments
2773  //
2774  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2775  ASSERT(source <= EPWM_SYNC_OUT_SOURCE_M);
2776 
2777  //
2778  // Disable EPWM Sync-Out Sources.
2779  //
2780  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCOUTEN) = HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCOUTEN) &
2781  ~((uint16_t)source);
2782 
2783 }
2784 //*****************************************************************************
2785 //
2799 //
2800 //*****************************************************************************
2801 static inline void
2802 EPWM_setOneShotSyncOutTrigger(uint32_t base,
2803  EPWM_OneShotSyncOutTrigger trigger)
2804 {
2805  //
2806  // Check the arguments
2807  //
2808  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2809 
2810  //
2811  // Set source for One-Shot Sync-Out Pulse.
2812  //
2813  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL3) =
2814  (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL3) & ~(EPWM_TBCTL3_OSSFRCEN)) |
2815  (uint16_t)trigger;
2816 }
2817 
2818 //*****************************************************************************
2819 //
2832 //
2833 //*****************************************************************************
2834 static inline void
2835 EPWM_setPeriodLoadMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_PeriodLoadMode loadMode)
2836 {
2837  //
2838  // Check the arguments
2839  //
2840  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2841 
2842  if(loadMode == EPWM_PERIOD_SHADOW_LOAD)
2843  {
2844  //
2845  // Clear PRDLD
2846  //
2847  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) &= ~EPWM_TBCTL_PRDLD;
2848  }
2849  else
2850  {
2851  //
2852  // Set PRDLD
2853  //
2854  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) |= EPWM_TBCTL_PRDLD;
2855  }
2856 }

2858 //

2871 {

2878  // Set PHSEN bit
2879  //
2880  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) |= EPWM_TBCTL_PHSEN;
2881 }

2925 {

2933  //

2935  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) & ~(EPWM_TBCTL_CTRMODE_M)) |

2961 {

2968  // Write to PRDLDSYNC bit
2969  //

2971  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL2) & ~(EPWM_TBCTL2_PRDLDSYNC_M)) |
2972  ((uint16_t)shadowLoadMode << EPWM_TBCTL2_PRDLDSYNC_S));
2973 }

2995  //

2997 }

3089

3091  // Return true if CTRMAX bit is set, false otherwise
3092  //
3093  return(((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBSTS) & EPWM_TBSTS_CTRMAX) ==
3094  EPWM_TBSTS_CTRMAX));
3095 }

3120 }

3135 {

3141  //

3143  //

3145  EPWM_TBSTS_SYNCI));

3223  //

3225 
3226 }

3246 {

3254  //

3256 }
3257 //*****************************************************************************
3258 //
3266 //
3267 //*****************************************************************************
3268 static inline uint16_t
3269 EPWM_getTimeBasePeriod(uint32_t base)
3270 {
3271  //
3272  // Check the arguments
3273  //
3274  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3275 
3276  //
3277  // Read from TBPRD bit
3278  //
