3280 }
3281 
3282 //*****************************************************************************
3283 //
3310 //
3311 //*****************************************************************************
3312 static inline void
3313 EPWM_setCounterCompareShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
3314  EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule,
3315  EPWM_CounterCompareLoadMode loadMode)
3316 {
3317  uint16_t syncModeOffset;
3318  uint16_t loadModeOffset;
3319  uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
3320  uint32_t registerOffset;
3321 
3322  //
3323  // Check the arguments
3324  //
3325  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3326 
3327  if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3328  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_C))
3329  {
3330  syncModeOffset = 10U;
3331  loadModeOffset = 0U;
3332  shadowModeOffset = 4U;
3333  }
3334  else
3335  {
3336  syncModeOffset = 12U;
3337  loadModeOffset = 2U;
3338  shadowModeOffset = 6U;
3339  }
3340 
3341  //
3342  // Get the register offset. EPWM_O_CMPCTL for A&B or
3343  // EPWM_O_CMPCTL2 for C&D
3344  //
3345  registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL + ((uint32_t)compModule & 0x1U) * 2U;
3346 
3347  //
3348  // Set the appropriate sync and load mode bits and also enable shadow
3349  // load mode. Shadow to active load can also be frozen.
3350  //
3351  HWREGH(registerOffset) = ((HWREGH(registerOffset) &
3352  ~((0x3U << syncModeOffset) | // Clear sync mode
3353  (0x3U << loadModeOffset) | // Clear load mode
3354  (0x1U << shadowModeOffset))) | // shadow mode
3355  ((((uint16_t)loadMode >> 2U) << syncModeOffset) |
3356  (((uint16_t)loadMode & 0x3U) << loadModeOffset)));
3357 }
3358 //*****************************************************************************
3359 //
3374 //
3375 //*****************************************************************************
3376 static inline void
3377 EPWM_disableCounterCompareShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
3378  EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule)
3379 {
3380  uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
3381  uint32_t registerOffset;
3382 
3383  //
3384  // Check the arguments
3385  //
3386  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3387 
3388  if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3389  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_C))
3390  {
3391  shadowModeOffset = 4U;
3392  }
3393  else
3394  {
3395  shadowModeOffset = 6U;
3396  }
3397 
3398  //
3399  // Get the register offset. EPWM_O_CMPCTL for A&B or
3400  // EPWM_O_CMPCTL2 for C&D
3401  //
3402  registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL + ((uint32_t)compModule & 0x1U) * 2U;
3403 
3404  //
3405  // Disable shadow load mode.
3406  //
3407  HWREGH(registerOffset) = (HWREGH(registerOffset) |
3408  (0x1U << shadowModeOffset));
3409 }
3410 //*****************************************************************************
3411 //
3427 //
3428 //*****************************************************************************
3429 static inline void
3430 EPWM_setCounterCompareValue(uint32_t base, EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule,
3431  uint16_t compCount)
3432 {
3433  uint32_t registerOffset;
3434 
3435  //
3436  // Check the arguments
3437  //
3438  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3439 
3440  //
3441  // Get the register offset for the Counter compare
3442  //
3443  registerOffset = EPWM_O_CMPA + (uint32_t)compModule * 2U;
3444 
3445  //
3446  // Write to the counter compare registers.
3447  //
3448  if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3449  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_B))
3450  {
3451  //
3452  // Write to COMPA or COMPB bits
3453  //
3454  HWREGH(base + registerOffset + 0x2U) = compCount;
3455  }
3456  else
3457  {
3458  //
3459  // Write to COMPC or COMPD bits
3460  //
3461  HWREGH(base + registerOffset) = compCount;
3462  }
3463 }
3464 //*****************************************************************************
3465 //
3479 //
3480 //*****************************************************************************
3481 static inline uint16_t
3482 EPWM_getCounterCompareValue(uint32_t base, EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule)
3483 {
3484  uint32_t registerOffset;
3485  uint16_t compCount;
3486 
3487  //
3488  // Check the arguments
3489  //
3490  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3491 
3492  //
3493  // Get the register offset for the Counter compare
3494  //
3495  registerOffset = EPWM_O_CMPA + (uint32_t)compModule * 2U;
3496 
3497  //
3498  // Read from the counter compare registers.
3499  //
3500  if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3501  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_B))
3502  {
3503  //
3504  // Read COMPA or COMPB bits
3505  //
3506  compCount = (uint16_t)((HWREG(base + registerOffset) &
3507  0xFFFF0000UL) >> 16U);
3508  }
3509  else
3510  {
3511  //
3512  // Read COMPC or COMPD bits
3513  //
3514  compCount = HWREGH(base + registerOffset);
3515  }
3516  return(compCount);
3517 }
3518 //*****************************************************************************
3519 //
3532 //
3533 //*****************************************************************************
3534 static inline bool
3535 EPWM_getCounterCompareShadowStatus(uint32_t base,
3536  EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule)
3537 {
3538  //
3539  // Check the arguments
3540  //
3541  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3542 
3543  //
3544  // Check the validity of input.
3545  // COMPA and COMPB are valid input arguments.
3546  //
3547  ASSERT((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3548  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_B));
3549 
3550  //
3551  // Read the value of SHDWAFULL or SHDWBFULL bit
3552  //
3553  return((((HWREG(base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL) >>
3554  ((((uint16_t)compModule >> 1U) & 0x1U) + 8U)) &
3555  0x1U) == 0x1U));
3556 }
3557 //*****************************************************************************
3558 //
3567 //
3568 //*****************************************************************************
3569 static inline void
3570 EPWM_enableLinkDutyHR(uint32_t base)
3571 {
3572  //
3573  // Check the arguments
3574  //
3575  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3576 
3577  //
3578  // Set LINKDUTYHR bit in CMPCTL register
3579  //
3580  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL) |= EPWM_CMPCTL_LINKDUTYHR;
3581 }
3582 //*****************************************************************************
3583 //
3592 //
3593 //*****************************************************************************
3594 static inline void
3595 EPWM_disableLinkDutyHR(uint32_t base)
3596 {
3597  //
3598  // Check the arguments
3599  //
3600  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3601 
3602  //
3603  // Clear LINKDUTYHR bit in CMPCTL register
3604  //
3605  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL) &= ~EPWM_CMPCTL_LINKDUTYHR;
3606 }
3607 //
3608 // Action Qualifier module related APIs
3609 //
3610 //*****************************************************************************
3611 //
3638 //
3639 //*****************************************************************************
3640 static inline void
3641 EPWM_setActionQualifierShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
3642  EPWM_ActionQualifierModule aqModule,
3643  EPWM_ActionQualifierLoadMode loadMode)
3644 {
3645  uint16_t syncModeOffset;
3646  uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
3647 
3648  //
3649  // Check the arguments
3650  //
3651  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3652 
3653  syncModeOffset = 8U + (uint16_t)aqModule;
3654  shadowModeOffset = 4U + (uint16_t)aqModule;
3655 
3656  //
3657  // Set the appropriate sync and load mode bits and also enable shadow
3658  // load mode. Shadow to active load can also be frozen.
3659  //
3660  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCTL) = ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCTL) &
3661  (~((0x3U << (uint16_t)aqModule) |
3662  (0x3U << (uint16_t)syncModeOffset))) |
3663  (0x1U << shadowModeOffset)) |
3664  ((((uint16_t)loadMode >> 2U) <<
3665  syncModeOffset) | (((uint16_t)loadMode &
3666  0x3U) << (uint16_t)aqModule)));
3667 }
3668 //*****************************************************************************
3669 //
3682 //
3683 //*****************************************************************************
3684 static inline void
3685 EPWM_disableActionQualifierShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
3686  EPWM_ActionQualifierModule aqModule)
3687 {
3688  uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
3689 
3690  //
3691  // Check the arguments
3692  //
3693  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3694 
3695  shadowModeOffset = 4U + (uint16_t)aqModule;
3696 
3697  //
3698  // Disable shadow load mode. Action qualifier is loaded on
3699  // immediate mode only.
3700  //
3701  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCTL) &= ~(1U << shadowModeOffset);
3702 }
3703 //*****************************************************************************
3704 //
3723 //
3724 //*****************************************************************************
3725 static inline void
3726 EPWM_setActionQualifierT1TriggerSource(uint32_t base,
3727  EPWM_ActionQualifierTriggerSource trigger)
3728 {
3729  //
3730  // Check the arguments
3731  //
3732  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3733 
3734  //
3735  // Set T1 trigger source
3736  //
3737  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQTSRCSEL) =
3738  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQTSRCSEL) & (~EPWM_AQTSRCSEL_T1SEL_M)) |
3739  ((uint16_t)trigger));
3740 }
3741 
3742 //*****************************************************************************
3743 //
3762 //
3763 //*****************************************************************************
3764 static inline void
3765 EPWM_setActionQualifierT2TriggerSource(uint32_t base,
3766  EPWM_ActionQualifierTriggerSource trigger)
3767 {
3768  //
3769  // Check the arguments
3770  //
3771  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3772 
3773  //
3774  // Set T2 trigger source
3775  //
3776  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQTSRCSEL) =
3777  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQTSRCSEL) & (~EPWM_AQTSRCSEL_T2SEL_M)) |
3778  ((uint16_t)trigger << EPWM_AQTSRCSEL_T2SEL_S));
3779 }
3780 //*****************************************************************************
3781 //
3820 //
3821 //*****************************************************************************
3822 static inline void
3823 EPWM_setActionQualifierAction(uint32_t base,
3824  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
3825  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutput output,
3826  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputEvent event)
3827 {
3828  uint32_t registerOffset;
3829  uint32_t registerTOffset;
3830 
3831  //
3832  // Check the arguments
3833  //
3834  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3835 
3836  //
3837  // Get the register offset
3838  //
3839  registerOffset = EPWM_O_AQCTLA + (uint32_t)epwmOutput * 2U;
3840  registerTOffset = EPWM_O_AQCTLA2 + (uint32_t)epwmOutput * 2U;
3841 
3842  //
3843  // If the event occurs on T1 or T2 events
3844  //
3845  if(((uint16_t)event & 0x1U) == 1U)
3846  {
3847  //
3848  // Write to T1U,T1D,T2U or T2D of AQCTLA2 register
3849  //
3850  HWREGH(base + registerTOffset) =
3851  ((HWREGH(base + registerTOffset) & ~(3U << ((uint16_t)event - 1U))) |
3852  ((uint16_t)output << ((uint16_t)event - 1U)));
3853  }
3854  else
3855  {
3856  //
3857  // Write to ZRO,PRD,CAU,CAD,CBU or CBD bits of AQCTLA register
3858  //
3859  HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
3860  ((HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~(3U << (uint16_t)event)) |
3861  ((uint16_t)output << (uint16_t)event));
3862  }
3863 }
3864 //*****************************************************************************
3865 //
3946 //
3947 //*****************************************************************************
3948 static inline void
3949 EPWM_setActionQualifierActionComplete(uint32_t base,
3950  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
3951  uint16_t action)
3952 {
3953  uint32_t registerOffset;
3954 
3955  //
3956  // Check the arguments
3957  //
3958  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3959 
3960  //
3961  // Get the register offset
3962  //
3963  registerOffset = EPWM_O_AQCTLA + (uint32_t)epwmOutput * 2U;
3964 
3965  //
3966  // Write to ZRO, PRD, CAU, CAD, CBU or CBD bits of AQCTLA register
3967  //
3968  HWREGH(base + registerOffset) = (uint16_t)action;
3969 }
3970 //*****************************************************************************
3971 //
4029 //
4030 //*****************************************************************************
4031 static inline void
4032 EPWM_setAdditionalActionQualifierActionComplete(uint32_t base,
4033  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
4034  uint16_t action)
4035 {
4036  uint32_t registerTOffset;
4037 
4038  //
4039  // Check the arguments
4040  //
4041  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4042 
4043  //
4044  // Get the register offset
4045  //
4046  registerTOffset = EPWM_O_AQCTLA2 + (uint32_t)epwmOutput * 2U;
4047 
4048  //
4049  // Write to T1U, T1D, T2U or T2D of AQCTLA2 register
4050  //
4051  HWREGH(base + registerTOffset) = (uint16_t)action;
4052 }
4053 //*****************************************************************************
4054 //
4073 //
4074 //*****************************************************************************
4075 static inline void
4076 EPWM_setActionQualifierContSWForceShadowMode(uint32_t base,
4077  EPWM_ActionQualifierContForce mode)
4078 {
4079  //
4080  // Check the arguments
4081  //
4082  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4083 
4084  //
4085  // Set the Action qualifier software action reload mode.
4086  // Write to RLDCSF bit
4087  //
4088  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) =
4089  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQSFRC_RLDCSF_M) |
4090  ((uint16_t)mode << EPWM_AQSFRC_RLDCSF_S));
4091 }
4092 //*****************************************************************************
4093 //
4112 //
4113 //*****************************************************************************
4114 static inline void
4115 EPWM_setActionQualifierContSWForceAction(uint32_t base,
4116  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
4117  EPWM_ActionQualifierSWOutput output)
4118 {
4119  //
4120  // Check the arguments
4121  //
4122  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4123 
4124  //
4125  // Initiate a continuous software forced output
4126  //
4127  if(epwmOutput == EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_A)
4128  {
4129  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCSFRC) =
4130  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQCSFRC_CSFA_M) |
4131  ((uint16_t)output));
4132  }
4133  else
4134  {
4135  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCSFRC) =
4136  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQCSFRC_CSFB_M) |
4137  ((uint16_t)output << EPWM_AQCSFRC_CSFB_S)) ;
4138  }
4139 }
4140 //*****************************************************************************
4141 //
4162 //
4163 //*****************************************************************************
4164 static inline void
4165 EPWM_setActionQualifierSWAction(uint32_t base,
4166  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
4167  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutput output)
4168 {
4169  //
4170  // Check the arguments
4171  //
4172  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4173 
4174  //
4175  // Set the one time software forced action
4176  //
4177  if(epwmOutput == EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_A)
4178  {
4179  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) =
4180  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQSFRC_ACTSFA_M) |
4181  ((uint16_t)output));
4182  }
4183  else
4184  {
4185  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) =
4186  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQSFRC_ACTSFB_M) |
4187  ((uint16_t)output << EPWM_AQSFRC_ACTSFB_S));
4188  }
4189 }
4190 //*****************************************************************************
4191 //
4204 //
4205 //*****************************************************************************
4206 static inline void
4207 EPWM_forceActionQualifierSWAction(uint32_t base,
4208  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput)
4209 {
4210  //
4211  // Check the arguments
4212  //
4213  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4214 
4215  //
4216  // Initiate a software forced event
4217  //
4218  if(epwmOutput == EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_A)
4219  {
4220  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) |= EPWM_AQSFRC_OTSFA;
4221  }
4222  else
4223  {
4224  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) |= EPWM_AQSFRC_OTSFB;
4225  }
4226 }
4227 //
4228 // Dead Band Module related APIs
4229 //
4230 //*****************************************************************************
4231 //
4250 //
4251 //*****************************************************************************
4252 static inline void
4253 EPWM_setDeadBandOutputSwapMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_DeadBandOutput output,
4254  bool enableSwapMode)
4255 {
4256  uint16_t mask;
4257 
4258  //
4259  // Check the arguments
4260  //
4261  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4262 
4263  mask = (uint16_t)1U << ((uint16_t)output + EPWM_DBCTL_OUTSWAP_S);
4264 
4265  if(enableSwapMode)
4266  {
4267  //
4268  // Set the appropriate outswap bit to swap output
4269  //
4270  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) | mask);
4271  }
4272  else
4273  {
4274  //
4275  // Clear the appropriate outswap bit to disable output swap
4276  //
4277  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~mask);
4278  }
4279 }
4280 //*****************************************************************************
4281 //
4300 //
4301 //*****************************************************************************
4302 static inline void
4303 EPWM_setDeadBandDelayMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_DeadBandDelayMode delayMode,
4304  bool enableDelayMode)
4305 {
4306  uint16_t mask;
4307 
4308  //
4309  // Check the arguments
4310  //
4311  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4312 
4313  mask = (uint16_t)1U << ((uint16_t)delayMode + EPWM_DBCTL_OUT_MODE_S);
4314 
4315  if(enableDelayMode)
4316  {
4317  //
4318  // Set the appropriate outmode bit to enable Dead Band delay
4319  //
4320  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) | mask);
4321  }
4322  else
4323  {
4324  //
4325  // Clear the appropriate outswap bit to disable output swap
4326  //
4327  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~ mask);
4328  }
4329 }
4330 //*****************************************************************************
4331 //
4349 //
4350 //*****************************************************************************
4351 static inline void
4352 EPWM_setDeadBandDelayPolarity(uint32_t base,
4353  EPWM_DeadBandDelayMode delayMode,
4354  EPWM_DeadBandPolarity polarity)
4355 {
4356  uint16_t shift;
4357 
4358  //
4359  // Check the arguments
4360  //
4361  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4362 
4363  shift = (((uint16_t)delayMode ^ 0x1U) + EPWM_DBCTL_POLSEL_S);
4364 
4365  //
4366  // Set the appropriate polsel bits for dead band polarity
4367  //
4368  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4369  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~ (1U << shift)) |
4370  ((uint16_t)polarity << shift));
4371 }
4372 //*****************************************************************************
4373 //
4387 //
4388 //*****************************************************************************
4389 static inline void
4390 EPWM_setRisingEdgeDeadBandDelayInput(uint32_t base, uint16_t input)
4391 {
4392  //
4393  // Check the arguments
4394  //
4395  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4396  ASSERT((input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_EPWMA) ||
4397  (input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_EPWMB));
4398 
4399  //
4400  // Set the Rising Edge Delay input
4401  //
4402  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4403  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~(1U << (EPWM_DBCTL_IN_MODE_S))) |
4404  (input << EPWM_DBCTL_IN_MODE_S));
4405 }
4406 //*****************************************************************************
4407 //
4424 //
4425 //*****************************************************************************
4426 static inline void
4427 EPWM_setFallingEdgeDeadBandDelayInput(uint32_t base, uint16_t input)
4428 {
4429  //
4430  // Check the arguments
4431  //
4432  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4433  ASSERT((input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_EPWMA) ||
4434  (input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_EPWMB) ||
4435  (input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_DB_RED));
4436 
4437  if(input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_DB_RED)
4438  {
4439  //
4440  // Set the Falling Edge Delay input
4441  //
4442  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) |= EPWM_DBCTL_DEDB_MODE;
4443  }
4444  else
4445  {
4446  //
4447  // Set the Falling Edge Delay input
4448  //
4449  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) &= ~EPWM_DBCTL_DEDB_MODE;
4450 
4451  //
4452  // Set the Rising Edge Delay input
4453  //
4454  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4455  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~(1U << (EPWM_DBCTL_IN_MODE_S + 1U))) |
4456  (input << (EPWM_DBCTL_IN_MODE_S + 1U)));
4457  }
4458 }
4459 //*****************************************************************************
4460 //
4476 //
4477 //*****************************************************************************
4478 static inline void
4479 EPWM_setDeadBandControlShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
4480  EPWM_DeadBandControlLoadMode loadMode)
4481 {
4482  //
4483  // Check the arguments
4484  //
4485  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4486 
4487  //
4488  // Enable the shadow mode and setup the load event
4489  //
4490  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL2) =
4491  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL2) & ~EPWM_DBCTL2_LOADDBCTLMODE_M) |
4492  (EPWM_DBCTL2_SHDWDBCTLMODE | (uint16_t)loadMode));
4493 }
4494 //*****************************************************************************
4495 //
4504 //
4505 //*****************************************************************************
4506 static inline void
4507 EPWM_disableDeadBandControlShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base)
4508 {
4509  //
4510  // Check the arguments
4511  //
4512  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4513 
4514  //
4515  // Disable the shadow load mode. Only immediate load mode only.
4516  //
4517  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL2) =
4518  (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL2) & ~EPWM_DBCTL2_SHDWDBCTLMODE);
4519 }
4520 //*****************************************************************************
4521 //
4536 //
4537 //*****************************************************************************
4538 static inline void
4539 EPWM_setRisingEdgeDelayCountShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
4540  EPWM_RisingEdgeDelayLoadMode loadMode)
4541 {
4542  //
4543  // Check the arguments
4544  //
4545  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4546 
4547  //
4548  // Enable the shadow mode. Set-up the load mode
4549  //
4550  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4551  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_LOADREDMODE_M) |
4552  ((uint16_t)EPWM_DBCTL_SHDWDBREDMODE |
4553  ((uint16_t)loadMode << EPWM_DBCTL_LOADREDMODE_S)));
4554 
4555 }
4556 //*****************************************************************************
4557 //
4565 //
4566 //*****************************************************************************
4567 static inline void
4568 EPWM_disableRisingEdgeDelayCountShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base)
4569 {
4570  //
4571  // Check the arguments
4572  //
4573  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4574 
4575  //
4576  // Disable the shadow mode.
4577  //
4578  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4579  (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_SHDWDBREDMODE);
4580 
4581 }
4582 //*****************************************************************************
4583 //
4598 //
4599 //*****************************************************************************
4600 static inline void
4601 EPWM_setFallingEdgeDelayCountShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
4602  EPWM_FallingEdgeDelayLoadMode loadMode)
4603 {
4604  //
4605  // Check the arguments
4606  //
4607  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4608 
4609  //
4610  // Enable the shadow mode. Setup the load mode.
4611  //
4612  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4613  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_LOADFEDMODE_M) |
4614  (EPWM_DBCTL_SHDWDBFEDMODE |
4615  ((uint16_t)loadMode << EPWM_DBCTL_LOADFEDMODE_S)));
4616 
4617 }
4618 //*****************************************************************************
4619 //
4628 //
4629 //*****************************************************************************
4630 static inline void
4631 EPWM_disableFallingEdgeDelayCountShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base)
4632 {
4633  //
4634  // Check the arguments
4635  //
4636  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4637 
4638  //
4639  // Disable the shadow mode.
4640  //
4641  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4642  (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_SHDWDBFEDMODE);
4643 }
4644 //*****************************************************************************
4645 //
4660 //
4661 //*****************************************************************************
4662 static inline void
4663 EPWM_setDeadBandCounterClock(uint32_t base,
4664  EPWM_DeadBandClockMode clockMode)
4665 {
4666  //
4667  // Check the arguments
4668  //
4669  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4670 
4671  //
4672  // Set the DB clock mode
4673  //
4674  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4675  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_HALFCYCLE) |
4676  ((uint16_t)clockMode << 15U));
4677 }
4678 //*****************************************************************************
4679 //
4689 //
4690 //*****************************************************************************
4691 static inline void
4692 EPWM_setRisingEdgeDelayCount(uint32_t base, uint16_t redCount)
4693 {
4694  //
4695  // Check the arguments
4696  //
4697  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4698  ASSERT(redCount < 0x4000U);
4699 
4700  //
4701  // Set the RED (Rising Edge Delay) count
4702  //
4703  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBRED) = redCount;
4704 }
4705 //*****************************************************************************
4706 //
4716 //
4717 //*****************************************************************************
4718 static inline void
4719 EPWM_setFallingEdgeDelayCount(uint32_t base, uint16_t fedCount)
4720 {
4721  //
4722  // Check the arguments
4723  //
4724  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4725  ASSERT(fedCount < 0x4000U);
4726 
4727  //
4728  // Set the RED (Rising Edge Delay) count
4729  //
4730  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBFED) = fedCount;
4731 }
4732 //
4733 // Chopper module related APIs
4734 //
4735 //*****************************************************************************
4736 //
4744 //
4745 //*****************************************************************************
4746 static inline void
4747 EPWM_enableChopper(uint32_t base)
4748 {
4749  //
4750  // Check the arguments
4751  //
4752  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4753 
4754  //
4755  // Set CHPEN bit. Enable Chopper
4756  //
4757  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) |= EPWM_PCCTL_CHPEN;
4758 }
4759 //*****************************************************************************
4760 //
4768 //
4769 //*****************************************************************************
4770 static inline void
4771 EPWM_disableChopper(uint32_t base)
4772 {
4773  //
4774  // Check the arguments
4775  //
4776  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4777 
4778  //
4779  // Clear CHPEN bit. Disable Chopper
4780  //
4781  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) &= ~EPWM_PCCTL_CHPEN;
4782 }
4783 //*****************************************************************************
4784 //
4796 //
4797 //*****************************************************************************
4798 static inline void
4799 EPWM_setChopperDutyCycle(uint32_t base, uint16_t dutyCycleCount)
4800 {
4801  //
4802  // Check the arguments
4803  //
4804  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4805  ASSERT(dutyCycleCount < 7U);
4806 
4807  //
4808  // Set the chopper duty cycle
4809  //
4810  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) =
4811  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) & ~EPWM_PCCTL_CHPDUTY_M) |
4812  (dutyCycleCount << EPWM_PCCTL_CHPDUTY_S));
4813 }
4814 //*****************************************************************************
4815 //
4827 //
4828 //*****************************************************************************
4829 static inline void
4830 EPWM_setChopperFreq(uint32_t base, uint16_t freqDiv)
4831 {
4832  //
4833  // Check the arguments
4834  //
4835  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4836  ASSERT(freqDiv < 8U);
4837 
4838  //
4839  // Set the chopper clock
4840  //
4841  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) =
4842  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) &
4843  ~(uint16_t)EPWM_PCCTL_CHPFREQ_M) |
4844  (freqDiv << EPWM_PCCTL_CHPFREQ_S));
4845 }
4846 //*****************************************************************************
4847 //
4859 //
4860 //*****************************************************************************
4861 static inline void
4862 EPWM_setChopperFirstPulseWidth(uint32_t base, uint16_t firstPulseWidth)
4863 {
4864  //
4865  // Check the arguments
4866  //
4867  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4868  ASSERT(firstPulseWidth < 16U);
4869 
4870  //
4871  // Set the chopper clock
4872  //
4873  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) =
4874  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) &
4875  ~(uint16_t)EPWM_PCCTL_OSHTWTH_M) |
4876  (firstPulseWidth << EPWM_PCCTL_OSHTWTH_S));
4877 }
4878 //
4879 // Trip Zone module related APIs
4880 //
4881 //*****************************************************************************
4882 //
4912 //
4913 //*****************************************************************************
4914 static inline void
4915 EPWM_enableTripZoneSignals(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzSignal)
4916 {
4917  //
4918  // Check the arguments
4919  //
4920  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4921 
4922  //
4923  // Set the trip zone bits
4924  //
4925 
4926  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZSEL) |= tzSignal;
4927 
4928 }
4929 //*****************************************************************************
4930 //
4960 //
4961 //*****************************************************************************
4962 static inline void
4963 EPWM_disableTripZoneSignals(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzSignal)
4964 {
4965  //
4966  // Check the arguments
4967  //
4968  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4969 
4970  //
4971  // Clear the trip zone bits
4972  //
4973 
4974  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZSEL) &= ~tzSignal;
4975 
4976 }
4977 //*****************************************************************************
4978 //
5007 //
5008 //*****************************************************************************
5009 static inline void
5010 EPWM_setTripZoneDigitalCompareEventCondition(uint32_t base,
5011  EPWM_TripZoneDigitalCompareOutput dcType,
5012  EPWM_TripZoneDigitalCompareOutputEvent dcEvent)
5013 {
5014  //
5015  // Check the arguments
5016  //
5017  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5018 
5019  //
5020  // Set Digital Compare Events conditions that cause a Digital Compare trip
5021  //
5022 
5023  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZDCSEL) =
5024  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZDCSEL) & ~(0x7U << (uint16_t)dcType)) |
5025  ((uint16_t)dcEvent << (uint16_t)dcType));
5026 
5027 }
5028 
5029 //*****************************************************************************
5030 //
5040 //
5041 //*****************************************************************************
5042 static inline void
5043 EPWM_enableTripZoneAdvAction(uint32_t base)
5044 {
5045  //
5046  // Check the arguments
5047  //
5048  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5049 
5050  //
5051  // Enable Advanced feature. Set ETZE bit
5052  //
5053 
5054  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) |= EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
5055 
5056 }
5057 //*****************************************************************************
5058 //
5066 //
5067 //*****************************************************************************
5068 static inline void
5069 EPWM_disableTripZoneAdvAction(uint32_t base)
5070 {
5071  //
5072  // Check the arguments
5073  //
5074  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5075 
5076  //
5077  // Disable Advanced feature. clear ETZE bit
5078  //
5079 
5080  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) &= ~EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
5081 
5082 }
5083 //*****************************************************************************
5084 //
5113 //
5114 //*****************************************************************************
5115 static inline void
5116 EPWM_setTripZoneAction(uint32_t base, EPWM_TripZoneEvent tzEvent,
5117  EPWM_TripZoneAction tzAction)
5118 {
5119  //
5120  // Check the arguments
5121  //
5122  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5123 
5124  //
5125  // Set the Action for Trip Zone events
5126  //
5127 
5128  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL) =
5129  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL) & ~(0x3U << (uint16_t)tzEvent)) |
5130  ((uint16_t)tzAction << (uint16_t)tzEvent)) ;
5131 
5132 }
5133 //*****************************************************************************
5134 //
5169 //
5170 //*****************************************************************************
5171 static inline void
5172 EPWM_setTripZoneAdvAction(uint32_t base, EPWM_TripZoneAdvancedEvent tzAdvEvent,
5173  EPWM_TripZoneAdvancedAction tzAdvAction)
5174 {
5175  //
5176  // Check the arguments
5177  //
5178  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5179 
5180  //
5181  // Set the Advanced Action for Trip Zone events
5182  //
5183 
5184  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) =
5185  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) & ~(0x7U << (uint16_t)tzAdvEvent)) |
5186  ((uint16_t)tzAdvAction << (uint16_t)tzAdvEvent));
5187 
5188  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) |= EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
5189 
5190 }
5191 //*****************************************************************************
5192 //
5224 //
5225 //*****************************************************************************
5226 static inline void
5227 EPWM_setTripZoneAdvDigitalCompareActionA(uint32_t base,
5228  EPWM_TripZoneAdvDigitalCompareEvent tzAdvDCEvent,
5229  EPWM_TripZoneAdvancedAction tzAdvDCAction)
5230 {
5231  //
5232  // Check the arguments
5233  //
5234  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5235 
5236  //
5237  // Set the Advanced Action for Trip Zone events
5238  //
5239 
5240  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTLDCA) =
5241  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTLDCA) & ~(0x7U << (uint16_t)tzAdvDCEvent)) |
5242  ((uint16_t)tzAdvDCAction << (uint16_t)tzAdvDCEvent));
5243 
5244  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) |= EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
5245 
5246 }
5247 //*****************************************************************************
5248 //
5280 //
5281 //*****************************************************************************
5282 static inline void EPWM_setTripZoneAdvDigitalCompareActionB(uint32_t base,
5283  EPWM_TripZoneAdvDigitalCompareEvent tzAdvDCEvent,
5284  EPWM_TripZoneAdvancedAction tzAdvDCAction)
5285 {
5286  //
5287  // Check the arguments
5288  //
5289  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5290 
5291  //
5292  // Set the Advanced Action for Trip Zone events
5293  //
5294 
5295  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTLDCB) =
5296  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTLDCB) & ~(0x7U << (uint16_t)tzAdvDCEvent)) |
5297  ((uint16_t)tzAdvDCAction << (uint16_t)tzAdvDCEvent));
5298 
5299  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) |= EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
5300 
5301 }
5302 //*****************************************************************************
5303 //
5323 //
5324 //*****************************************************************************
5325 static inline void
5326 EPWM_enableTripZoneInterrupt(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzInterrupt)
5327 {
5328  //
5329  // Check the arguments
5330  //
5331  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5332  ASSERT((tzInterrupt > 0U) && (tzInterrupt <= 0x80U));
5333 
5334  //
5335  // Enable Trip zone interrupts
5336  //
5337 
5338  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZEINT) |= tzInterrupt;
5339 
5340 }
5341 //*****************************************************************************
5342 //
5362 //
5363 //***************************************************************************
5364 static inline void
5365 EPWM_disableTripZoneInterrupt(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzInterrupt)
5366 {
5367  //
5368  // Check the arguments
5369  //
5370  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5371  ASSERT((tzInterrupt > 0U) && (tzInterrupt <= 0x80U));
5372 
5373  //
5374  // Disable Trip zone interrupts
5375  //
5376 
5377  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZEINT) &= ~tzInterrupt;
5378 
5379 }
5380 //*****************************************************************************
5381 //
5399 //
5400 //***************************************************************************
5401 static inline uint16_t
5402 EPWM_getTripZoneFlagStatus(uint32_t base)
5403 {
5404  //
5405  // Check the arguments
5406  //
5407  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5408 
5409  //
5410  // Return the Trip zone flag status
5411  //
5412  return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZFLG) & 0xFFU);
5413 }
5414 //*****************************************************************************
5415 //
5436 //
5437 //***************************************************************************
5438 static inline uint16_t
5439 EPWM_getCycleByCycleTripZoneFlagStatus(uint32_t base)
5440 {
5441  //
5442  // Check the arguments
5443  //
5444  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5445 
5446  //
5447  // Return the Cycle By Cycle Trip zone flag status
5448  //
5449  return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCBCFLG) & 0x1FFU);
5450 }
5451 //*****************************************************************************
5452 //
5472 //
5473 //***************************************************************************
5474 static inline uint16_t
5475 EPWM_getOneShotTripZoneFlagStatus(uint32_t base)
5476 {
5477  //
5478  // Check the arguments
5479  //
5480  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5481 
5482  //
5483  // Return the One Shot Trip zone flag status
5484  //
5485  return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZOSTFLG) & 0x1FFU);
5486 }
5487 //*****************************************************************************
5488 //
5505 //
5506 //**************************************************************************
5507 static inline void
5508 EPWM_selectCycleByCycleTripZoneClearEvent(uint32_t base,
5509  EPWM_CycleByCycleTripZoneClearMode clearEvent)
5510 {
5511  //
5512  // Check the arguments
5513  //
5514  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5515 
5516  //
5517  // Set the Cycle by Cycle Trip Latch mode
5518  //
5519 
5520  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCLR) =
5521  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCLR) & ~EPWM_TZCLR_CBCPULSE_M) |
5522  ((uint16_t)clearEvent << EPWM_TZCLR_CBCPULSE_S));
5523 
5524 }
5525 //*****************************************************************************
5526 //
5547 //
5548 //***************************************************************************
5549 static inline void
5550 EPWM_clearTripZoneFlag(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzFlags)
5551 {
5552  //
5553  // Check the arguments
5554  //
5555  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5556  ASSERT(tzFlags <= 0x80U);
5557 
5558  //
5559  // Clear Trip zone event fag
5560  //
5561 
5562  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCLR) |= tzFlags;
5563 
5564 }
5565 //*****************************************************************************
5566 //
5587 //
5588 //***************************************************************************
5589 static inline void
5590 EPWM_clearCycleByCycleTripZoneFlag(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzCBCFlags)
5591 {
5592  //
5593  // Check the arguments
5594  //
5595  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5596  ASSERT(tzCBCFlags < 0x800U);
5597 
5598  //
5599  // Clear the Cycle By Cycle Trip zone flag
5600  //
5601 
5602  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCBCCLR) |= tzCBCFlags;
5603 
5604 }
5605 //*****************************************************************************
5606 //
5625 //
5626 //***************************************************************************
5627 static inline void
5628 EPWM_clearOneShotTripZoneFlag(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzOSTFlags)
5629 {
5630  //
5631  // Check the arguments
5632  //
5633  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5634  ASSERT(tzOSTFlags < 0x800U);
5635 
5636  //
5637  // Clear the Cycle By Cycle Trip zone flag
5638  //
5639 
5640  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZOSTCLR) |= tzOSTFlags;
5641 
5642 }
5643 //*****************************************************************************
5644 //
5661 //
5662 //***************************************************************************
5663 static inline void
5664 EPWM_forceTripZoneEvent(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzForceEvent)
5665 {
5666  //
5667  // Check the arguments
5668  //
5669  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5670  ASSERT((tzForceEvent & 0xFF81U) == 0U);
5671 
5672  //
5673  // Force a Trip Zone event
5674  //
5675 
5676  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZFRC) |= tzForceEvent;
5677 
5678 }
5679 //*****************************************************************************
5680 //
5697 //
5698 //***************************************************************************
5699 static inline void
5700 EPWM_enableTripOutSource(uint32_t base, EPWM_selectTripOutSource tzTripOut)
5701 {
5702  //
5703  // Check the arguments
5704  //
5705  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5706 
5707  //
5708  // Configures the TRIPOUT source
5709  //
5710 
5711  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZTRIPOUTSEL) |= 1U << (uint32_t)tzTripOut;
5712 
5713 }
5714 //*****************************************************************************
5715 //
5732 //
5733 //***************************************************************************
5734 static inline void
5735 EPWM_disableTripOutSource(uint32_t base, EPWM_selectTripOutSource tzTripOut)
5736 {
5737  //
5738  // Check the arguments
5739  //
5740  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5741 
5742  //
5743  // Disables the TRIPOUT source
5744  //
5745 
5746  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZTRIPOUTSEL) &= ~(1U << (uint32_t)tzTripOut);
5747 
5748 }
5749 //
5750 // Event Trigger related APIs
5751 //
5752 //*****************************************************************************
5753 //
5761 //
5762 //*****************************************************************************
5763 static inline void
5764 EPWM_enableInterrupt(uint32_t base)
5765 {
5766  //
5767  // Check the arguments
5768  //
5769  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5770 
5771  //
5772  // Enable ePWM interrupt
5773  //
5774  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_INTEN;
5775 }
5776 //*****************************************************************************
5777 //
5785 //
5786 //*****************************************************************************
5787 static inline void
5788 EPWM_disableInterrupt(uint32_t base)
5789 {
5790  //
5791  // Check the arguments
5792  //
5793  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5794 
5795  //
5796  // Disable ePWM interrupt
5797  //
5798  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_INTEN;
5799 }
5800 //*****************************************************************************
5801 //
5826 //
5827 //*****************************************************************************
5828 static inline void
5829 EPWM_setInterruptSource(uint32_t base, uint16_t interruptSource)
5830 {
5831  uint16_t intSource;
5832 
5833  //
5834  // Check the arguments
5835  //
5836  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5837  ASSERT(((interruptSource > 0U) && (interruptSource < 9U)) ||
5838  (interruptSource == 10U) || (interruptSource == 12U) ||
5839  (interruptSource == 14U));
5840 
5841  if((interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
5842  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
5843  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
5844  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
5845  {
5846  //
5847  // Shift the interrupt source by 1
5848  //
5849  intSource = interruptSource >> 1U;
5850 
5851  //
5852  // Enable events based on comp C or comp D
5853  //
5854  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_INTSELCMP;
5855  }
5856  else if((interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPA) ||
5857  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPB) ||
5858  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPA) ||
5859  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPB))
5860  {
5861  intSource = interruptSource;
5862 
5863  //
5864  // Enable events based on comp A or comp B
5865  //
5866  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_INTSELCMP;
5867  }
5868  else
5869  {
5870  intSource = interruptSource;
5871  }
5872 
5873  //
5874  // Set the interrupt source
5875  //
5876  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) =
5877  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) & ~EPWM_ETSEL_INTSEL_M) | intSource);
5878 }
5879 //*****************************************************************************
5880 //
5891 //
5892 //*****************************************************************************
5893 static inline void
5894 EPWM_setInterruptEventCount(uint32_t base, uint16_t eventCount)
5895 {
5896  //
5897  // Check the arguments
5898  //
5899  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5900  ASSERT(eventCount < 16U);
5901 
5902  //
5903  // Enable advanced feature of interrupt every up to 15 events
5904  //
5905  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETPS) |= EPWM_ETPS_INTPSSEL;
5906  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETINTPS) =
5907  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETINTPS) & ~EPWM_ETINTPS_INTPRD2_M) |
5908  eventCount);
5909 }
5910 //*****************************************************************************
5911 //
5921 //
5922 //*****************************************************************************
5923 static inline bool
5924 EPWM_getEventTriggerInterruptStatus(uint32_t base)
5925 {
5926  //
5927  // Check the arguments
5928  //
5929  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5930 
5931  //
5932  // Return INT bit of ETFLG register
5933  //
5934  return(((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETFLG) & 0x1U) == 0x1U));
5935 }
5936 //*****************************************************************************
5937 //
5945 //
5946 //*****************************************************************************
5947 static inline void
5948 EPWM_clearEventTriggerInterruptFlag(uint32_t base)
5949 {
5950  //
5951  // Check the arguments
5952  //
5953  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5954 
5955  //
5956  // Clear INT bit of ETCLR register
5957  //
5958  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCLR) |= EPWM_ETCLR_INT;
5959 }
5960 //*****************************************************************************
5961 //
5972 //
5973 //*****************************************************************************
5974 static inline void
5975 EPWM_enableInterruptEventCountInit(uint32_t base)
5976 {
5977  //
5978  // Check the arguments
5979  //
5980  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5981 
5982  //
5983  // Enable interrupt event count initializing/loading
5984  //
5985  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) |= EPWM_ETCNTINITCTL_INTINITEN;
5986 }
5987 //*****************************************************************************
5988 //
5997 //
5998 //*****************************************************************************
5999 static inline void
6000 EPWM_disableInterruptEventCountInit(uint32_t base)
6001 {
6002  //
6003  // Check the arguments
6004  //
6005  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6006 
6007  //
6008  // Disable interrupt event count initializing/loading
6009  //
6010  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) &= ~EPWM_ETCNTINITCTL_INTINITEN;
6011 }
6012 //*****************************************************************************
6013 //
6025 //
6026 //*****************************************************************************
6027 static inline void
6028 EPWM_forceInterruptEventCountInit(uint32_t base)
6029 {
6030  //
6031  // Check the arguments
6032  //
6033  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6034 
6035  //
6036  // Load the Interrupt Event counter value
6037  //
6038  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) |= EPWM_ETCNTINITCTL_INTINITFRC;
6039 }
6040 //*****************************************************************************
6041 //
6052 //
6053 //*****************************************************************************
6054 static inline void
6055 EPWM_setInterruptEventCountInitValue(uint32_t base, uint16_t eventCount)
6056 {
6057  //
6058  // Check the arguments
6059  //
6060  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6061  ASSERT(eventCount < 16U);
6062 
6063  //
6064  // Set the Pre-interrupt event count
6065  //
6066  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) =
6067  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) & ~EPWM_ETCNTINIT_INTINIT_M) |
6068  (uint16_t)(eventCount & 0xFU)); // why 0xFU?
6069 }
6070 //*****************************************************************************
6071 //
6079 //
6080 //*****************************************************************************
6081 static inline uint16_t
6082 EPWM_getInterruptEventCount(uint32_t base)
6083 {
6084  //
6085  // Check the arguments
6086  //
6087  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6088 
6089  //
6090  // Return the interrupt event count
6091  //
6092  return(((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETINTPS) & EPWM_ETINTPS_INTCNT2_M) >>
6093  EPWM_ETINTPS_INTCNT2_S));
6094 }
6095 //*****************************************************************************
6096 //
6104 //
6105 //*****************************************************************************
6106 static inline void
6107 EPWM_forceEventTriggerInterrupt(uint32_t base)
6108 {
6109  //
6110  // Check the arguments
6111  //
6112  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6113 
6114  //
6115  // Set INT bit of ETFRC register
6116  //
6117  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETFRC) |= EPWM_ETFRC_INT;
6118 }
6119 //*****************************************************************************
6120 //
6147 //
6148 //*****************************************************************************
6149 static inline void
6150 EPWM_setMixEvtTriggerSource(uint32_t base, EPWM_ETMixSignalSelect etmixSignal,
6151  EPWM_ETMixTriggerSource interruptSource)
6152 {
6153  uint32_t registerOffset;
6154 
6155  //
6156  // Check the arguments
6157  //
6158  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6159  ASSERT((uint32_t)interruptSource < 11U);
6160 
6161  registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_ETINTMIXEN + (uint32_t)etmixSignal * 2;
6162 
6163  //
6164  // Set the ETMIX source
6165  //
6166  HWREGH(registerOffset) |= 1U << (uint32_t)interruptSource;
6167 }
6168 //
6169 // ADC SOC configuration related APIs
6170 //
6171 //*****************************************************************************
6172 //
6184 //
6185 //*****************************************************************************
6186 static inline void
6187 EPWM_enableADCTrigger(uint32_t base, EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6188 {
6189  //
6190  // Check the arguments
6191  //
6192  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6193 
6194  //
6195  // Enable an SOC
6196  //
6197  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6198  {
6199  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_SOCAEN;
6200  }
6201  else
6202  {
6203  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBEN;
6204  }
6205 }
6206 //*****************************************************************************
6207 //
6219 //
6220 //*****************************************************************************
6221 static inline void
6222 EPWM_disableADCTrigger(uint32_t base, EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6223 {
6224  //
6225  // Check the arguments
6226  //
6227  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6228 
6229  //
6230  // Disable an SOC
6231  //
6232  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6233  {
6234  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCAEN;
6235  }
6236  else
6237  {
6238  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBEN;
6239  }
6240 }
6241 //*****************************************************************************
6242 //
6270 //
6271 //*****************************************************************************
6272 static inline void
6273 EPWM_setADCTriggerSource(uint32_t base,
6274  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType,
6275  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionSource socSource)
6276 {
6277  uint16_t source;
6278 
6279  //
6280  // Check the arguments
6281  //
6282  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6283 
6284  if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
6285  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
6286  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
6287  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
6288  {
6289  source = (uint16_t)socSource >> 1U;
6290  }
6291  else
6292  {
6293  source = (uint16_t)socSource;
6294  }
6295 
6296  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6297  {
6298  //
6299  // Set the SOC source
6300  //
6301  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) =
6302  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) & ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASEL_M) |
6303  (source << EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASEL_S));
6304 
6305  //
6306  // Enable the comparator selection
6307  //
6308  if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPA) ||
6309  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPB) ||
6310  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPA) ||
6311  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPB))
6312  {
6313  //
6314  // Enable events based on comp A or comp B
6315  //
6316  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASELCMP;
6317  }
6318  else if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
6319  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
6320  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
6321  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
6322  {
6323  //
6324  // Enable events based on comp C or comp D
6325  //
6326  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASELCMP;
6327  }
6328  else
6329  {
6330  //
6331  // No action required for the other socSource options
6332  //
6333  }
6334  }
6335  else
6336  {
6337  //
6338  // Enable the comparator selection
6339  //
6340  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) =
6341  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) & ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSEL_M) |
6342  (source << EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSEL_S));
6343 
6344  //
6345  // Enable the comparator selection
6346  //
6347  if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPA) ||
6348  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPB) ||
6349  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPA) ||
6350  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPB))
6351  {
6352  //
6353  // Enable events based on comp A or comp B
6354  //
6355  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSELCMP;
6356  }
6357  else if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
6358  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
6359  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
6360  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
6361  {
6362  //
6363  // Enable events based on comp C or comp D
6364  //
6365  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSELCMP;
6366  }
6367  else
6368  {
6369  //
6370  // No action required for the other socSource options
6371  //
6372  }
6373  }
6374 }
6375 //*****************************************************************************
6376 //
6396 //
6397 //*****************************************************************************
6398 static inline void
6399 EPWM_setADCTriggerEventPrescale(uint32_t base,
6400  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType,
6401  uint16_t preScaleCount)
6402 {
6403  //
6404  // Check the arguments
6405  //
6406  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6407  ASSERT(preScaleCount < 16U);
6408 
6409  //
6410  // Enable advanced feature of SOC every up to 15 events
6411  //
6412  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETPS) |= EPWM_ETPS_SOCPSSEL;
6413  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6414  {
6415  //
6416  // Set the count for SOC A
6417  //
6418  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) =
6419  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) & ~EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCAPRD2_M) |
6420  preScaleCount);
6421  }
6422  else
6423  {
6424  //
6425  // Set the count for SOC B
6426  //
6427  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) =
6428  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) & ~EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCBPRD2_M) |
6429  (preScaleCount << EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCBPRD2_S));
6430  }
6431 }
6432 //*****************************************************************************
6433 //
6446 //
6447 //*****************************************************************************
6448 static inline bool
6449 EPWM_getADCTriggerFlagStatus(uint32_t base,
6450  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6451 {
6452  //
6453  // Check the arguments
6454  //
6455  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6456 
6457  //
6458  // Return the SOC A/ B status
6459  //
6460  return((((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETFLG) >>
6461  ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 2U)) & 0x1U) == 0x1U));
6462 }
6463 //*****************************************************************************
6464 //
6476 //
6477 //*****************************************************************************
6478 static inline void
6479 EPWM_clearADCTriggerFlag(uint32_t base,
6480  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6481 {
6482  //
6483  // Check the arguments
6484  //
6485  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6486 
6487  //
6488  // Clear SOC A/B bit of ETCLR register
6489  //
6490  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCLR) |= 1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 2U);
6491 }
6492 //*****************************************************************************
6493 //
6509 //
6510 //*****************************************************************************
6511 static inline void
6512 EPWM_enableADCTriggerEventCountInit(uint32_t base,
6513  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6514 {
6515  //
6516  // Check the arguments
6517  //
6518  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6519 
6520  //
6521  // Enable SOC event count initializing/loading
6522  //
6523  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) |= 1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 14U);
6524 }
6525 //*****************************************************************************
6526 //
6541 //
6542 //*****************************************************************************
6543 static inline void
6544 EPWM_disableADCTriggerEventCountInit(uint32_t base,
6545  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6546 {
6547  //
6548  // Check the arguments
6549  //
6550  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6551 
6552  //
6553  // Disable SOC event count initializing/loading
6554  //
6555  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) &=
6556  ~(1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 14U));
6557 }
6558 //*****************************************************************************
6559 //
6572 //
6573 //*****************************************************************************
6574 static inline void
6575 EPWM_forceADCTriggerEventCountInit(uint32_t base,
6576  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6577 {
6578  //
6579  // Check the arguments
6580  //
6581  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6582 
6583  //
6584  // Load the Interrupt Event counter value
6585  //
6586  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) |= 1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 11U);
6587 }
6588 
6589 //*****************************************************************************
6590 //
6604 //
6605 //*****************************************************************************
6606 static inline void
6607 EPWM_setADCTriggerEventCountInitValue(uint32_t base,
6608  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType,
6609  uint16_t eventCount)
6610 {
6611  //
6612  // Check the arguments
6613  //
6614  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6615  ASSERT(eventCount < 16U);
6616 
6617  //
6618  // Set the ADC Trigger event count
6619  //
6620  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6621  {
6622  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) =
6623  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) & ~EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCAINIT_M) |
6624  (uint16_t)(eventCount << EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCAINIT_S));
6625  }
6626  else
6627  {
6628  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) =
6629  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) & ~EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCBINIT_M) |
6630  (eventCount << EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCBINIT_S));
6631  }
6632 }
6633 //*****************************************************************************
6634 //
6646 //
6647 //*****************************************************************************
6648 static inline uint16_t
6649 EPWM_getADCTriggerEventCount(uint32_t base,
6650  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6651 {
6652  uint16_t eventCount;
6653 
6654  //
6655  // Check the arguments
6656  //
6657  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6658 
6659  //
6660  // Return the SOC event count
6661  //
6662  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6663  {
6664  eventCount = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) >>
6665  EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCACNT2_S) & 0xFU;
6666  }
6667  else
6668  {
6669  eventCount = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) >>
6670  EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCBCNT2_S) & 0xFU;
6671  }
6672  return(eventCount);
6673 }
6674 //*****************************************************************************
6675 //
6687 //
6688 //*****************************************************************************
6689 static inline void
6690 EPWM_forceADCTrigger(uint32_t base, EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6691 {
6692  //
6693  // Check the arguments
6694  //
6695  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6696 
6697  //
6698  // Set SOC A/B bit of ETFRC register
6699  //
6700  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETFRC) |= 1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 2U);
6701 }
6702 //
6703 // Digital Compare module related APIs
6704 //
6705 //*****************************************************************************
6706 //
6728 //
6729 //*****************************************************************************
6730 static inline void
6731 EPWM_selectDigitalCompareTripInput(uint32_t base,
6732  EPWM_DigitalCompareTripInput tripSource,
6733  EPWM_DigitalCompareType dcType)
6734 {
6735  //
6736  // Check the arguments
6737  //
6738  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6739 
6740  //
6741  // Set the DC trip input
6742  //
6743 
6744  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCTRIPSEL) =
6745  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCTRIPSEL) & ~(0xFU << ((uint16_t)dcType << 2U))) |
6746  ((uint16_t)tripSource << ((uint16_t)dcType << 2U)));
6747 
6748 }
6749 //
6750 // DCFILT
6751 //
6752 //*****************************************************************************
6753 //
6761 //
6762 //*****************************************************************************
6763 static inline void
6764 EPWM_enableDigitalCompareBlankingWindow(uint32_t base)
6765 {
6766  //
6767  // Check the arguments
6768  //
6769  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6770 
6771  //
6772  // Enable DC filter blanking window
6773  //
6774 
6775  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) |= EPWM_DCFCTL_BLANKE;
6776 
6777 }
6778 //*****************************************************************************
6779 //
6787 //
6788 //*****************************************************************************
6789 static inline void
6790 EPWM_disableDigitalCompareBlankingWindow(uint32_t base)
6791 {
6792  //
6793  // Check the arguments
6794  //
6795  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6796 
6797  //
6798  // Disable DC filter blanking window
6799  //
6800 
6801  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) &= ~EPWM_DCFCTL_BLANKE;
6802 
6803 }
6804 //*****************************************************************************
6805 //
6814 //
6815 //*****************************************************************************
6816 static inline void
6817 EPWM_enableDigitalCompareWindowInverseMode(uint32_t base)
6818 {
6819  //
6820  // Check the arguments
6821  //
6822  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6823 
6824  //
6825  // Enable DC window inverse mode.
6826  //
6827 
6828  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) |= EPWM_DCFCTL_BLANKINV;
6829 
6830 }

6845  //
6846  // Check the arguments
6847  //

6849 
6850  //
6851  // Disable DC window inverse mode.
6852  //
6853

6855 
6856 }
6857 //*****************************************************************************
6858 //
6874 //
6875 //*****************************************************************************
6876 static inline void
6877 EPWM_setDigitalCompareBlankingEvent(uint32_t base,
6878  EPWM_DigitalCompareBlankingPulse blankingPulse)
6879 {
6880  //
6881  // Check the arguments
6882  //
6883  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6884 
6885  //
6886  // Set DC blanking event
6887  //
6888 
6889  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) =
6890  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & ~EPWM_DCFCTL_PULSESEL_M) |
6891  ((uint16_t)((uint32_t)blankingPulse << EPWM_DCFCTL_PULSESEL_S)));
6892 
6893 }
6894 //*****************************************************************************
6895 //
6910 //
6911 //*****************************************************************************
6912 static inline void
6913 EPWM_setDigitalCompareFilterInput(uint32_t base,
6914  EPWM_DigitalCompareFilterInput filterInput)
6915 {
6916  //
6917  // Check the arguments
6918  //
6919  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6920 
6921  //
6922  // Set the signal source that will be filtered
6923  //
6924 
6925  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) =
6926  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & ~EPWM_DCFCTL_SRCSEL_M) |
6927  ((uint16_t)filterInput));
6928 
6929 }
6930 //
6931 // DC Edge Filter
6932 //
6933 //*****************************************************************************
6934 //
6943 //
6944 //*****************************************************************************
6945 static inline void
6946 EPWM_enableDigitalCompareEdgeFilter(uint32_t base)
6947 {
6948  //
6949  // Check the arguments
6950  //
6951  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6952 
6953  //
6954  // Enable DC Edge Filter
6955  //
6956 
6957  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) |= EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGEFILTSEL;
6958 
6959 }
6960 //*****************************************************************************
6961 //
6969 //
6970 //*****************************************************************************
6971 static inline void
6972 EPWM_disableDigitalCompareEdgeFilter(uint32_t base)
6973 {
6974  //
6975  // Check the arguments
6976  //
6977  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6978 
6979  //
6980  // Disable DC Edge Filter
6981  //
6982 
6983  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) &= ~EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGEFILTSEL;
6984 
6985 }
6986 
6987 //*****************************************************************************
6988 //
7001 //
7002 //*****************************************************************************
7003 static inline void
7004 EPWM_setDigitalCompareEdgeFilterMode(uint32_t base,
7005  EPWM_DigitalCompareEdgeFilterMode edgeMode)
7006 {
7007  //
7008  // Check the arguments
7009  //
7010  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7011 
7012  //
7013  // Set DC Edge filter mode
7014  //
7015 
7016  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) =
7017  (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & ~EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGEMODE_M) |
7018  ((uint16_t)edgeMode << EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGEMODE_S);
7019 
7020 }
7021 
7022 //*****************************************************************************
7023 //
7041 //
7042 //*****************************************************************************
7043 static inline void
7044 EPWM_setDigitalCompareEdgeFilterEdgeCount(uint32_t base, uint16_t edgeCount)
7045 {
7046  //
7047  // Check the arguments
7048  //
7049  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7050 
7051  //
7052  // Set DC Edge filter edge count
7053  //
7054 
7055  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) &
7056  ~EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGECOUNT_M) |
7057  (edgeCount << EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGECOUNT_S);
7058 
7059 }
7060 //*****************************************************************************
7061 //
7070 //
7071 //*****************************************************************************
7072 static inline uint16_t
7073 EPWM_getDigitalCompareEdgeFilterEdgeCount(uint32_t base)
7074 {
7075  //
7076  // Check the arguments
7077  //
7078  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7079 
7080  //
7081  // Return configured DC edge filter edge count
7082  //
7083  return((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGECOUNT_M) >>
7084  EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGECOUNT_S);
7085 }
7086 //*****************************************************************************
7087 //
7096 //
7097 //*****************************************************************************
7098 static inline uint16_t
7099 EPWM_getDigitalCompareEdgeFilterEdgeStatus(uint32_t base)
7100 {
7101  //
7102  // Check the arguments
7103  //
7104  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7105 
7106  //
7107  // Return captured edge count by DC Edge filter
7108  //
7109  return((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGESTATUS_M) >>
7110  EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGESTATUS_S);
7111 }

7128 {

7131  //
7132  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7133 
7134  //
7135  // Set the blanking window offset in TBCLK counts
7136  //
7137  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFOFFSET) = windowOffsetCount;
7138 }

7157  //
7158  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7159 
7160  //
7161  // Set the blanking window length in TBCLK counts
7162  //

7164 }
7165 //*****************************************************************************

7175 //*****************************************************************************
7176 static inline uint16_t
7177 EPWM_getDigitalCompareBlankingWindowOffsetCount(uint32_t base)
7178 {

7180  // Check the arguments
7181  //
7182  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7183 
7184  //
7185  // Return the Blanking Window Offset count
7186  //
7187  return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFOFFSETCNT));
7188 }

7201 EPWM_getDigitalCompareBlankingWindowLengthCount(uint32_t base)
7202 {
7203  //

7205  //
7206  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7207 
7208  //
7209  // Return the Blanking Window Length count
7210  //
